The Non-Sovereign Princely

and Ducal Houses of Europe

Volume III - CIII

THE PRINCELY HOUSE OF CLARY u. ALDRINGEN

The members of this family bear the title Graf or Gräfin

von Clary und Aldringen. The head of the family has the

formal style of Serene Highness.
